about_the_game:
An exciting tower defense game where you have to defend your island from the invasion of enemy forces.
Your task is to build and upgrade towers to repel waves of attacking enemies.

Become a true commander, place defensive structures on the island, and don't let enemies penetrate the territory!
Your strategic thinking and ability to effectively use resources will be key in this struggle for survival.

Features:
- 3D Graphics
- Five types of towers: You have access to five different types of towers for defense. Each tower has its own unique characteristics. Choose wisely to effectively deal with enemies.
- Variety of enemies: A variety of enemies await you in the game.
- Strategic thinking: Place towers so that they cover the most vulnerable points of the island and effectively restrain enemies.
